titles.title: Extending the thoughts and prayers of the House of Representatives to Governor Frank O'Bannon of Indiana, his wife Judy, and his family and friends, and expressing hope for a full recovery from the stroke he suffered on September 8, 2003.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Civil Service and Agency Organization.

bill.summary: 9/10/2003--Introduced. Extends the thoughts and prayers of the House of Representatives, on behalf of the American people, to Governor Frank O'Bannon of Indiana, his wife Judy, and his family and friends, and expresses hope for a full recovery from the stroke he suffered on September 8, 2003.
